messages.subject: Nature or nurture
messages.messageBody:
<<So why do I unschool? Why are my kids so important to
me? I think these are things that I came to
unconsciously as a child and I could never concieve of
being any other way. Certainly I could never be what
my parents were to me.>>

I think there is so much to be learned about people, genetics and why we
are the way we are. My father and his brother were severely beaten
throughout their childhood by an alcoholic father. My uncle followed in
his dad's footsteps while my dad drank very little and swore off spanking
after doing it only once.

I believe that nurture can have a huge impact on one's nature but the
evidence on genetics seems pretty compelling. Wouldn't it be great if we
could back up time and REraise a person in a loving unschool home to see
what difference it made?

Kris
